utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: A Video Store, Monica is running in to return a video.]

utterances.transcript: Hi.

I can help with that.

utterances.transcript: Oh my God. Richard? Hi!

utterances.transcript: Hi!
Wow! Your lip went bald. Hey, thanks.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Wow! Your lip went bald. (Richard pays the clerk) Hey, thanks.

utterances.transcript: So, you look great.
Right.
No you do. You... just...
What?
You've got panties stuck to your leg.
That's because I-I was just grabbing some things out of the dryer, and it's static cling. Or maybe it's just that God knew I'd be running into you and saw an opportunity.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (removes them) That's because I-I was just grabbing some things out of the dryer, and it's static cling. Or maybe it's just that God knew I'd be running into you and saw an opportunity.

utterances.transcript: It's good to see you.
It's good to see you too.

utterances.transcript: Hey.

utterances.transcript: Hey.

utterances.transcript: Oh, I was reading it last night, and I got scared, so.

Well, safer. Y'know, I mean I never start reading The Shining, without making sure we've got plenty of room in the freezer, y'know.

Well, umm, I guess I read Little Women more than once. But I mean that's a classic, what's so great about The Shining?

Okay. Ah, well we'll just see about that, okay. I will read The Shining, and you will read Little Women.

utterances.transcript: All right, you got it.

Okay.
Okay.

Yeah.

Oh shoot! Maybe next time. Thanks for a lovely evening.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh shoot! Maybe next time. (yawns) Thanks for a lovely evening. (shows her out)
[Cut to into the bedroom, with Monica still hiding under the covers. Richard enters and sits down next to her.]

utterances.transcript: So um, who was she?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (still hiding under the blankets) So um, who was she?

utterances.transcript: Oh, that was the blind date that I told you about, she called and switched it to today.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh, (laughs) that was the blind date that I told you about, she called and switched it to today.

utterances.transcript: Did you like her? And I'm just asking as a friend, because I am totally fine with this.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (still hiding under the blankets) Did you like her? And I'm just asking as a friend, because I am totally fine with this.

utterances.transcript: Well, you seem fine.
Okay, y'know what, I'm not fine, I'm not. I mean how can I be fine, hearing you come in with her, she wants to see your bedroom.... Y'know what, what if we're friends who don't see other people?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (gets up) Okay, y'know what, I'm not fine, I'm not. I mean how can I be fine, hearing you come in with her, she wants to see your bedroom.... (pause) Y'know what, what if we're friends who don't see other people?

utterances.transcript: You mean like exclusive friends?

Why not?! I mean this has been the most amazing week. Would it be so terrible? Even if we were friends who lived together. Or, maybe someday friends who stood up in front of their other friends, and vowed to be friends forever.
Wow. Y'know we're back where we were. Honey, I would love to do all that, but nothing's changed.
That's not true, you don't have a moustache.
Okay, okay, one thing's changed. But we still want different things and we know how this is gonna end.
Y'know what, I've got to walk out of here right now, 'cause getting over you is the hardest thing that I have ever had to do. I don't think I could do it again.
I know I couldn't. So....

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Monica kisses him.)

utterances.transcript: How 'bout one last game of racquetball?

utterances.transcript_with_note: (They both kiss, and Richard picks her up and goes over to the bed and starts to lie down.)

utterances.transcript: Watch the thorns!
Ow!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (lying down) Ow!!

span_qa.question: What happened to Monica when she put a rose in her mouth ?
Who was Richard 's date ?
When Richard walked into the bedroom where did he find Monica ?

answers.answer_text: Monica still hiding under the covers .

span_qa.question: Where was Monica when Richard walks in with his date ?
Why does Richard look different to Monica ?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Joey is entering, and he's very dejected.]

utterances.transcript: What?
Beth is really, really sick.
Awwww.
Jo's there, but I don't think there's anything she could do.

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Rachel hugs him)

utterances.transcript: Joey?
Yeah.
Do you want to put the book in the freezer?
Okay.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (nodding his head) Okay.

utterances.transcript: Okay.

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Joey hands her the book and she puts it in the freezer.)

plots: However , Joey nears the ending of Little Women , and is about to burst into tears , when Rachel suggests to put the book in the freezer .
Beth is really sick and there 's not much Jo can do .

span_qa.question: What are they referring to ?
Who is with Beth ?
Where does Joey put the book ?

answers.answer_text: put the book in the freezer

span_qa.question: Why is Joey upset ?
